name: Odysseus And The Sea
description:
Sail from the nymph Calypso back to your wife Penelope.

You control the ship using WASD, and the sail by using the mouse.
Gain speed by aligning the sail with the wind, and the boat with the sail.
Avoid sailing into land and rocks.
You can find north by finding Polaris by night.

Assets: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1VSDzcOawfRV3VKN21wVGdDd2M/edit?usp=sharing
Windows build: Odysseus And The Sea win.exe.tar
Linux build: Odysseus And The Sea linux.tar
Mac build: Odysseus And The Sea.app.tar
